tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Understand the architecture of this workshop and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Key Vault (OKV)
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Key Vault (OKV)

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Review a typical TDE environment
tutorials.description: Confirm the encryption status of an Oracle database, and understand how TDE has been setup.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Migrate to OKV in 5 easy steps
tutorials.description: Prepare Oracle Key Vault for the incoming database and install the OKV endpoint software on the database host

tutorials.title: Lab 6: True Migration
tutorials.description: Upload pre-migration TDE keys from the TDE wallet to OKV

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Enable lights-out operations
tutorials.description: Learn how to setup an auto-open OKV connection

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Ignore intermittent connectivity issues with Persistent cache
tutorials.description: See how OKVs persistent cache keeps your databases running ...

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Increase key protection in riskier environments
Lab 10: Automate re-key operation
tutorials.description: Learn how to hide the keystore password in a Secure Extermal Password Store

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Bring Your Own Key and use it
tutorials.description: Upload an externally generated key into OKV

tutorials.title: Lab 12: Key Vault (OKV)
tutorials.description: Key Vault in a typical customer deployment

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
